level.heading: LIGHTING AND VENTILATION IN HIGH DENSITY USE ROOMS (§ 14-1309)

level.text: Each room used for high density occupancy shall have at least twenty-five percent (25%) more natural light than is required by § 502 of this subtitle.
Each room used for high density occupancy shall have at least twenty-five percent (25%) more ventilation than is required by § 506 of this subtitle.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 7302, Commissioners’ Order 53-1503 (August 11, 1955).
